reviewText: im really into anything abe so this was a great addition to my collection! my partner and i have been students of this work for about 7 years now, the dvd's are always handy to have and i feel the abe group does a great job of editing them to showcase the best moments, etc.
Title: Let Loose! The Law of Attraction In Action, Episode X

reviewText: We all love it. Jerry & Esther's work with Abraham is life changing! Thank you so much for every thing!
Title: Let Loose! The Law of Attraction In Action, Episode X

reviewText: Esther Hicks has been joyfully providing people with tools to find out who they really are ever since she and her husband Jerry began working with the Abraham material over 20 years ago.  Her boundless energy, straight talk, good sense of humor and love of humanity come through in every breath she takes, with the help of the non-physical energy she calls Abraham.  Not to be confused by newcomers with anything biblical, Abraham is the name Esther found that best represents the breadth of wisdom and information Abraham brings forth.  Abraham is a collection of non-physical teachers who speak through one voice--the voice of Esther Hicks.When I was completing my masters degree in transpersonal psychology in 1982, it would still be many years before I was ready to discover Abraham, which I finally did in 2006.  I knew when I turned in my thesis that I had only scratched the surface of what I was looking for--something I could not imagine until now.  I was not ready for it until then, but once I was ready (as the saying goes) the teacher appeared:  Abraham and the law of attraction teachings.I have been able to completely transform my life through these teachings, and I realize now that everything I have done up until now has been leading me to this moment.  But that can be said of each of you reading this.  Do not think for a minute that your life has been futile, or that you have wasted years doing stupid stuff or missed something--it is all important.  It is you.  But now, right now, you can become more of who you really meant to become when you entered this world for a short time to become physical and explore this fantastic life.Esther and her husband Jerry are the embodiment of what I am striving for in my own life--complete integration of male/female, demonstrating unconditional love for all mankind.  And most importantly, the Abraham teachings show us how to achieve that.  Please, please, please--if you are a seeker at all, try one of the Abraham tapes, or go to their web site:  [...] and try some of their free cds and recordings available on line.  It takes some time to figure it out, but if you can stay with it you might just find your very own path to your pot of gold at the end of your very own rainbow waiting for you.  I know I did.  Thank you forever to Abraham, Jerry and Esther.  There is great love here for you.The Law of Attraction: The Basics of the Teachings of AbrahamMoney, and the Law of Attraction: Learning to Attract Wealth, Health, and HappinessTelling a New Story: The Law of Attraction In Action, Episode IXMoney, and the Law of AttractionIntroducing Abraham - The Secret Behind "The Secret"
Title: Let Loose! The Law of Attraction In Action, Episode X

reviewText: I love these guys, they positively impacted my life. I look forward to every one of their videos because they just make sense and make you feel better.
Title: Let Loose! The Law of Attraction In Action, Episode X

reviewText: This is a wonderful episode that covers some very important topics. I particularly enjoyed learning more about meditation and other tools that are used to manifest desires. I laughed, I vibrated on a higher level, but most of all I learned. I really enjoy learning and being a part of the enlightening Jerry and Esther experience.
Title: Let Loose! The Law of Attraction In Action, Episode X

reviewText: I own every Law Of Attraction dvd and each one is amazing and evry one will speak right to you. CAn be watched over and over with new insights every time.
Title: Let Loose! The Law of Attraction In Action, Episode X

reviewText: As a long time students of Abraham (Esther & Jerry Hicks), we found this DVD to be one of the best.  Actually, videos of the teachings are far superior to the books, which lack real live footage that leads to greater comprehension.Also see numerous other videos on the same subject, such as:Revealing the Secret!: The Law of Attraction In Action, Episode VEverything You Want!: The Law of Attraction in Action, Episode VIITelling a New Story: The Law of Attraction In Action, Episode IX
summary: Let Loose! The Law of Attraction In Action...
Title: Let Loose! The Law of Attraction In Action, Episode X
